name: Magnet Mayhem (IggyLikesToCode)
description:
Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #18!

Use your array of weapons and magic magnetic powers to fight off a variety of enemies including... dio?

!Downloading is recommended!

Instructions:

L-Shift - Magnetic Repel/Pull

WASD - Movement

Jump Next To Wall - Wallrun

Mouse Click - Shoot

123/Scrollwheel - Weapons

ALT - Change between Repel and Pull
